I20040511 (4pm)

I found this in the log allthough I didn't notice any problems during editing 
Java files.

I'm not sure if jface.text is Text or UI component. Please reassign if 
necessary.

Dani, I think there is little I can do here. The exception happens when the 
document tries to add a document changed listener to the list of document 
listeners and there seems to be an iterator attached to the list as well.

There are two places where we add/remove document listeners in the non-UI thread:
- quick diff
- mark occurrences job

I've fixed the mark occurrence job which most likely caused this exception.

Tom, see whether you find time to fix this for 3.0. As stated above I think I
catched the biggest fish. Quick Diff only modifies the listener list during init
phase.
will investigate after M9 is out.
